data.name: AVRToDataTable
data.value:
Using ASNA.DataGate.Client
...
DclConst DBNAME Value("*Public/Cypress")
DclFld db Type(ASNA.DataGate.Client.AdgConnection) DclFld Query Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver) DclFld dt Type(DataTable)
db = *New AdgConnection(DBNAME)
Query = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver(db) Query.Args.Inputs.Library = "{library}" Query.Args.Inputs.File = "{file}" Query.Args.Inputs.FieldsList = "{fieldsList}" Query.Args.Inputs.Rows = {rows} Query.Args.Inputs.Query = "{query}"
{parms} dt = Query.Exec() *As DataTable // DataTable now available for databinding or other use. Generally you'll assign this // DataTable to a grid's or some other control's DataSource property. If (Query.Args.Error.ErrorException <> *Nothing) // Work with exception here EndIf db.Close()

data.name: AVRToExcel
data.value:
Using ASNA.DataGate.Client
...
DclConst DBNAME Value("*Public/Cypress") DclConst EXCEL_FILE Value("C:\spreadsheets\customers.xlsx")
DclFld db Type(ASNA.DataGate.Client.AdgConnection) DclFld Query Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver) DclFld dt Type(DataTable) DclFld ExcelAdapter Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.ToExcelAdapter)
db = *New AdgConnection(DBNAME)
Query = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver(db) Query.Args.Inputs.Library = "{library}" Query.Args.Inputs.File = "{file}" Query.Args.Inputs.FieldsList = "{fieldsList}" Query.Args.Inputs.Rows = {rows} Query.Args.Inputs.Query = "{query}"
ExcelAdapter = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.ToExcelAdapter(Query.Args) Query.OverrideAdapter(ExcelAdapter) Query.Args.Inputs.Options.Add("heading","Customer Listing") Query.Args.Inputs.Options.Add("worksheet_name","Customers")
{parms} Query.Exec() // Excel spreadsheet is now available in the Query object. In a Windows you'll // probably use the ToExcelAdapter's SaveToLocalFile() method to save // save the spreadsheeet. If (Query.Args.Error.ErrorException <> *Nothing) // Work with exception here EndIf ExcelAdapter.SaveToLocalFile(EXCEL_FILE) db.Close()

data.name: AVRToJson
data.value:
Using ASNA.DataGate.Client
...
DclConst DBNAME Value("*Public/Cypress")
DclFld db Type(ASNA.DataGate.Client.AdgConnection) DclFld Query Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver) DclFld dt Type(DataTable) DclFld Json Type(*String)
db = *New AdgConnection(DBNAME)
Query = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver(db) Query.Args.Inputs.Library = "{library}" Query.Args.Inputs.File = "{file}" Query.Args.Inputs.FieldsList = "{fieldsList}" Query.Args.Inputs.Rows = {rows} Query.Args.Inputs.Query = "{query}"
Query.OverrideAdapter(*New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.ToJsonAdapter(Query.Args)) Query.Args.Inputs.Options.Add("indentJson",*True)
{parms} Json = Query.Exec() *As *String // The Json data is now available. Generally you'll emit this data in a Web // app for JavaScript use. If (Query.Args.Error.ErrorException <> *Nothing) // Work with exception here EndIf db.Close()

data.name: AVRToListItemArray
data.value:
Using ASNA.DataGate.Client Using System.Web
...
DclConst DBNAME Value("*Public/Cypress") DclConst EXCEL_FILE Value("C:\spreadsheets\customers.xlsx")
DclFld db Type(ASNA.DataGate.Client.AdgConnection) DclFld Query Type(ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver) DclFld dt Type(DataTable) DclArray ListItems Type(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem) Rank(1)
db = *New AdgConnection(DBNAME)
Query = *New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.QueryDriver(db) Query.Args.Inputs.Library = "{library}" Query.Args.Inputs.File = "{file}" Query.Args.Inputs.FieldsList = "{fieldsList}" Query.Args.Inputs.Rows = {rows} Query.Args.Inputs.Query = "{query}" Query.OverrideAdapter(*New ASNA.Helpers.DataServices.ToLisItemArrayAdapter(Query.Args))
{parms} ListItems = Query.Exec() *As As System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem[] // The array of ListItems is now available. Generally you'll use a ComboBox // or DropDownList's AddRange() method to assign this array. If (Query.Args.Error.ErrorException <> *Nothing) // Work with exception here EndIf db.Close()
